text:
Welcome to Rachel's English. This channel
is dedicated to American English pronunciation.

You'll be able to see videos that go over
the specific mouth positions of sounds. I

also have sets of videos on word stress, rhythm,
and words that reduce. For example, did you

know that the word 'for' will usually be pronounced
'fer' in a sentence? I got this for you. We

also have speech studies, where you'll learn
how to listen for the characteristics of American

English, and some real-life videos, where
you can study pronunciation while hanging

out with me and my friends. I hope you'll
spend lots of time here, post questions, and

post video responses to practice your English.
For even more materials, check out my website,

RachelsEnglish.com. I look forward to being
your pronunciation coach.

Don't stop there. Keep going with my American
English in real life playlist, my reduction

and linking playlist, or any of the playlists
on my channel. And don't forget to visit Rachel's

English.com, where there's lots more to work
with.
